translation.text: Airport & South Line, Bankstown Line, Eastern Suburbs & Illawarra Line, Hunter Line, Inner West & Leppington Line - Delays

Services are delayed due to severe weather conditions affecting infrastructure across the rail network. Please allow additional travel time. You are also advised to check platform screens and Transport Apps and listen to announcements for updates as stopping patterns and departure platforms may change at short notice.

Train services have been suspended between Bathurst and Springwood in both directions due to a landslide at Leura and earlier infrastructure damage caused by bushfires. Due to the large number of buses required for incidents across multiple areas a very limited amount of buses will replace trains between Bathurst and Springwood. A reduced frequency train service will operate between Springwood and Central. Major delays are expected to services. Please avoid any non-essential travel. If you must travel then allow plenty of additional travel time as major delays can be expected. Please check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check Transport Apps for updates.
Central Coast & Newcastle Line - Partial Closure

Train services are suspended between Gosford and Hornsby in both directions due to severe weather conditions affecting signalling and track equipment at Hawkesbury River. Due to the large number of buses required for incidents across multiple areas a very limited amount of buses are replacing trains between Gosford and Hornsby. A reduced frequency train service is operating between Newcastle Interchange and Gosford. Please avoid any non-essential travel. If you must travel then allow plenty of additional travel time as major delays can be expected. Please check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check Transport Apps for updates.

Due to severe weather conditions affecting infrastructure, services are suspended on Cumberland Line. Please change at Granville to complete your journey. Please allow additional travel time, check platform screens before boarding your service and plan your trip at transportnsw.info/plan.
North Shore Line, Northern Line, Western Line - Major delays

Major delays are being experienced in both directions due to a landslip at Artarmon. Please avoid any non-essential travel. If you must travel then allow plenty of additional travel time. Customers may need to change trains to complete your journey.

Please check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check Transport Apps for updates.

Services are suspended between Lidcombe and Olympic Park due to flooding at Olympic Park. Buses are replacing trains between Lidcombe and Olympic Park in both directions. Please allow additional travel time.

Train services have been suspended between Wollongong & Bomaderry due to severe weather conditions causing flooding at various locations and replaced by buses. Due to the large number of buses required for incidents across multiple areas a very limited amount of buses will replace trains between Wollongong & Bomaderry. Buses are also replacing trains between Port Kembla and Wollongong due to flooding at Port Kembla. Please avoid any non-essential travel. If you must travel then allow plenty of additional travel time as major delays can be expected. Please check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check Transport Apps for updates.

Train services are suspended between Goulburn and Campbelltown in both directions due to severe weather conditions affecting infrastructure at various locations. Due to the large number of buses required for incidents across multiple areas a very limited amount of buses are replacing trains between Goulburn and Campbelltown. Please avoid any non-essential travel. If you must travel then allow plenty of additional travel time as major delays can be expected. Please check indicator boards, listen to announcements and check Transport Apps for updates.

With ongoing rainfall being experienced and the potential of flash flooding, please remember to take extra care when boarding and alighting from trains, and when travelling through station concourses or platforms. Weather conditions may impact train services in some areas; Before you travel please check Transport apps or visit transportnsw.info for up-to-date train running information.

The lift between George Street and the concourse is temporarily out of service. If you require assistance, please ask staff or phone 9379 4110.

Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from George Street to Concourse Level will be closed from Saturday 08 February until July 2020.   During these works, Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.

Metro services are terminating and commencing from North Ryde station due to flooding between North Ryde and Chatswood. Replacement buses are in operation, however customers wishing to change for a Metro service should do so at Epping instead of Chatswood.
Station Update - Croydon, Glenbrook, Holsworthy and more

Canley Vale, Cowan, Croydon, Glenbrook, Holsworthy, Strathfield & Sutherland Stations - External power supply issues are affecting platform screens, Opal card readers and station lighting. For Opal information or fare adjustments, please visit transportnsw.info/opal.

The public toilets at Beverly Hills station are currently unavailable while major repairs take place. Temporary toilets have been provided and are located outside the station on Tooronga Terrace. These facilities can be accessed during staffed hours. We apologise for any inconvenience.

Due to station maintenance works, the pedestrian ramp between Richmond Platform 2 and the concourse is closed. If you are unable to use the stairs, a shuttle bus to and from East Richmond station will be available.   For further assistance, please see station staff or call 9851 7248.

The public toilets at St James Station are closed while major works are taking place. Public toilets are located at the Elizabeth Street entrance to the right and in Hyde Park through the Macquarie Street tunnel up the stairs to the right. We apologise for any inconvenience.
Severe weather conditions are affecting rail infrastructure including lifts, indicator screens, P.A system. For assistance please contact the Station staff.

New Metro Platforms are being constructed on platforms 1 & 2 at Sydenham Station. T3 Bankstown Line services to the City operate from platform 3 & T3 Bankstown Line services to Lidcombe and Liverpool operate from platform 4. Platform 4, 5 & 6 upgrade works - A new Metro concourse is also being constructed at the Northern end of the station. While the concourse is being installed, please board and alight from the first 5 carriages of the train on platforms 4 & 6 and the last 6 carriages of the train on platform 5. If you need help, please see staff at the station. For more information on these upgrades, please see sydneymetro.info

Station Upgrade - Customers, due to Wynyard station upgrade the lifts from the concourse level to George Street will be closed from Saturday 8th February until July 2020. Customers will be able use alternate lifts from Wynyard Station to Carrington Street and York Street accessed via Margaret Street.  For further information or assistance, Please follow station staff instructions, station signage or call Wynyard Station on 9224 2959.
